name: heal-order
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user calls out
its underlings to heal
it. The user regains
up to half of its
max HP.

It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
